messages.subject: Re: [AlwaysLearning] Always Learning Live, in Minnesota
messages.msgSnippet: Events specifically related to or in keeping with this discussion list are listed here. http://speakingsandradodd.blogspot.com (not yet listed, Albuquerque
messages.messageBody:
Events specifically related to or in keeping with this discussion list are listed here.
http://speakingsandradodd.blogspot.com
(not yet listed, Albuquerque between Christmas and New Year's; possible ALL event in late October 2014 in southern Californiaâ€”several of them are in 2014)

Deb Cunefare runs an announcements list of events in north America here:
http://groups.yahoo.com/group/unschoolingcircuitriders/
It started off for people who were travelling in RVs to events, I think.
Some of those are better than others. Read their sites and ask around if you're considering one.

Sandra

messages.subject: Always Learning Live, in Minnesota
messages.msgSnippet: Anyone who was thinking about this and hadn t decided, or anyone who s read this far and wondering WHY DIDN T I KNOW THIS? should know that today is the last
messages.messageBody:
Anyone who was thinking about this and hadn't decided, or anyone who's read this far and wondering WHY DIDN'T I KNOW THIS? should know that today is the last day for getting the conference rate at the hotel. So if you're going to be thinking about it, maybe make a hotel reservation you cancel if you decide not to.

The event is May 2-5 (2013, now/soon), and some families are staying the evening of the 5th.

It's a waterpark hotel NW of Minneapolis, and more information is here:
http://allunschoolingminnesota2013.blogspot.com

Sandra
